bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

text.body:
Territory of Washington County of Spokane
To any Constable and keeper of the jail of said County
Whereas David E. Kimble and A.B. Coriell has been brought this day befire the undersigned one of the justices of the peace in and for said County. Charged on the oath/// of William W. Tinkham with hearing on the 25th day of August 1887 in said County "did then and there, and in /// and threatening manner and being arnmed with a double barreled shot gun carred in the hands of David E. Kimble, did threaten to do great bodily injury to the said William W. Tinkham, and Annie L. Tinkham. To wit: to beat strike and kill said Wiliam W. Tinkham and Annie L. Tinkham, and in the progress /// The said justice finds /// of the complaint made by the said William W. Tinkham against the said David E. Kimble and A.B. Corriell is unfounded and frisolous, and whereas at said trial it was ordered that the defendants be discharged
And it was further ordered and adjudged by the court that the said complainant William W. Tinkham pay the costs of the prosecution on said Complaint /// at the sum of forty and 25/100 $40.25 dollars, and that he stand commited until said costs are paid or he is otherwise legally discharged.
Therefore in the name of the United States, you are commanded to take the body of said William W. Tinkham and /// convey and deliver to the /// of the jail of said County who is hereby commanded to recieve and keep the said William W. Tinkham in safe custody in prison unti the aforesaid sum of $40.25 and all legal /// be paid and satisfied, or until he be discharged therefrom by due course of law, and of this writ make due return according to law.
Given under my hand this 2nd day of September 1887
John T. Mason Justice of the Peace
Justices Court #5524
Territory of Wash vs. W.W. Tinkham
Copi
es
Jasper Gates
Filed Sept. 14/87 W.E. Ledgerwood Clerk
Costs Justices Costs $4.35 for cops .50 4.85
Constable $11.70 Witnesses A. Hartson $2.00 L.A. Ford 2.00 Mr. Blogitt 2.20 E.G. English 2.00 Mr. O Cleary 2.00 Mrs. O Cleary 2.00 William Gage 2.00 Mrs M Kimble 2.00 Ida Kimble 2.00 Mrs. 2.00 Mr. Barrington 2.00 Mrs. Barrington 2.00
